title: Guinness Super League : FAP , Lekié FF In Final Battle
body_text:
Guinness Super League : FAP, Lekié FF In Final Battle
- Par Elizabeth MOSIMA
- 09 Jun 2023 12:37
- 0 Likes
The last playing day of the women’s championship will take place on Saturday, June 10, 2023 at the Yaounde Omnisports Annex 1 Stadium.
It will be an exciting weekend for lovers of women football in the country. The final of the Guinness Super League counting for day 22 of the competition will take place on Saturday, June 10, 2023 at the Yaounde Omnisports Annex 1 Stadium. The final match will pit champions, Lekié FF against Amazones FAP of Yaounde. The encounter promises to produce fireworks as each side will be seeking to secure their positions on the league table.
Leaders, Lekié FF with 54 points will take on Amazones FAP, fourth on the league table with 38 points. Even though Lekié ladies are already champions, they will be out to gain more points and keep a greater distance from the others. Amazones FAP on their part will be seeking to secure a comfortable seat on the table by grabbing the three points of the last playing day. Organisers have decided to allow entrance into the stadium free to enable the public have an opportunity to watch women football. Meanwhile, Louves Minproff have secured a comfortable sixth position on the league table after thrashing Ngadeu FFA 4-1 in a delayed day 18 match of the Guinness Super League on Tuesday, June 6, 2023 at the CAF Excellence Centre in Mbankomo. Louves Minproff’s goals were scored by Alice M. (2’) and Ghislain Larissa at the 12th minute during the first half. The other two goals were scored by Rais...
